column4: How do I tell apt-get that I have manually installed librrd, so that when I install collectd it doesn't automatically install librrd?
the solution is to not install manually :)
and how do I solve the problem that the packaged copy of librrd has bindings that are incompatible with ruby 1.9.2, which is the version of ruby I use?

not sure in your case. but you can always specify what version you want to install. if your repo doesnt have what you need, chanses are there is a repo with just what you need, or install deb files via dpkg (dont think apt does it(
